item.title: 亚洲股市将追随华尔街科技股反弹：市场综述
item.description: 亚洲股市有望追随华尔街的涨势，因为科技股引领反弹，而且投资者对美联储可能在 12 月降息的信心增强。【原文：Asian stocks were poised to track Wall Street gains as technology shares led a rebound and investors grew more confident about a potential Federal Reserve rate cut in December.】

item.title: Thoma Bravo 的 Realpage 公司通过数据协议与司法部达成和解
item.description: Thoma Bravo LLC 旗下的 RealPage 公司与美国司法部就一起反托拉斯案件达成和解协议，该案指控 RealPage 公司垄断了租房软件市场，并在美国各地的住宅业主中助长了操纵价格的共谋行为。【原文：Thoma Bravo LLC’s RealPage Inc. and the Justice Department reached a settlement agreement in an antitrust case that had accused the company of monopolizing the market for rental property software and fostering a price-fixing conspiracy among residential landlords around the US.】

item.title: 加息促使日本地区银行为生存而合并
item.description: 三十年前，日本曾因一场坏账危机而被迫掀起兼并浪潮，从而造就了其超大型贷款机构，而现在的焦点则是美国 3 万亿美元地区银行业的整合。【原文：Three decades after a bad debt crisis in Japan forced a wave of mergers that created its mega lenders, the focus now is on consolidation in the nation’s $3 trillion regional banking industry.】

item.title: 特朗普签署 "创世使命 "令，以人工智能推动创新
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普总统周一签署了一项行政命令，成立了 "创世使命"（Genesis Mission），这是联邦政府推动人工智能创新的最新举措。【原文：President Donald Trump signed an executive order Monday establishing the “Genesis Mission,” a federal effort to boost innovation using artificial intelligence — the latest step by the administration to promote AI technology and its adoption.】

item.title: 必和必拓试图破坏铜矿巨额交易的三天
item.description: 上周四晚，这家全球最大的矿商厚颜无耻地试图破坏该行业有史以来最大的一笔交易。然而，仅仅三天之后，竞标就已失败。【原文：Last Thursday night, the world’s biggest miner made a brazen attempt to gatecrash one of the industry’s biggest-ever deals. Yet just three days later, the bid was already dead.】

item.title: Zoom 报告销售强劲，扩大产品范围是个好兆头
item.description: Zoom Communications Inc. 公布的季度收入超过了分析师的预期，这表明该软件制造商的商业工具扩展套件实力强劲。【原文：Zoom Communications Inc. reported quarterly revenue that topped analysts’ estimates, a sign of strength for the software maker’s expanded suite of business tools.】

item.title: Binance 面临哈马斯受害者根据反恐法提起的诉讼
item.description: Binance Holdings Ltd. 面临一项诉讼，声称该加密货币平台在哈马斯于 2023 年 10 月 7 日袭击以色列，造成 1200 人死亡，250 人被劫持之前，"有意为 "哈马斯的加密货币交易提供了便利。【原文：Binance Holdings Ltd. faces a lawsuit claiming the cryptocurrency platform “knowingly facilitated” crypto transactions by Hamas before the group attacked Israel on Oct. 7, 2023, killing 1,200 people and taking 250 hostages.】

item.title: 特朗普的 2,000 美元关税退税计划为何难获盟友青睐？
item.description:
今日要闻：特朗普在经济承受能力问题上面临新的压力，他提出的计划面临一些重大障碍。【原文：

Today on the Big Take: As Trump confronts new pressures over affordability, he’s proposed a plan that faces some major roadblocks.

】

item.title: 首次公开募股后业绩下滑，纳凡扫除人工智能承诺的买入评级
item.description: Navan Inc. 周一赢得了华尔街亟需的支持，分析师认为这家企业差旅和费用平台的价值被低估了，因为上个月该公司以 9.231 亿美元首次公开募股（IPO）后迅速遭到抛售。【原文：Navan Inc. won much-needed support from Wall Street on Monday, with analysts deeming the corporate-travel and expense platform undervalued after a swift selloff following its $923.1 million IPO last month.】

item.title: 美国国债上涨，交易员增加 12 月降息押注
item.description: 在美联储官员发表鸽派言论后，交易商继续重新调整对下月降息的押注，国债连续第三个交易日上涨。【原文：Treasuries gained for a third session as traders continued to recalibrate wagers on an interest-rate cut next month following dovish comments by Federal Reserve officials.】

item.title: 部长称德国将于三月份就天然气厂招标
item.description: 德国经济部长凯瑟琳娜-莱切（Katherina Reiche）在柏林表示，德国计划在 2026 年 3 月举行新建燃气发电厂的拍卖会。【原文：Germany plans to hold auctions to for the construction of new gas-fired power plants in March 2026, Economy Minister Katherina Reiche said in Berlin.】

item.title: 苹果公司罕见裁员，整个销售部门裁员
item.description: 苹果公司为精简向企业、学校和政府提供产品的方式，裁撤了数十个销售职位，这是这家 iPhone 制造商罕见的裁员行动。【原文：Apple Inc. has eliminated dozens of sales roles in a bid to streamline the way it offers products to businesses, schools and governments, marking a rare layoff for the iPhone maker.】

item.title: 播客公司希望利用行业热潮套现
item.description:
日益视觉化的行业正受益于围绕视频创作者经济的更广泛的繁荣。【原文：

The increasingly visual industry is benefitting from a broader exuberance surrounding the video-creator economy. 

】

item.title: K 型经济如何伤害富人之外的所有人
item.description: 关于 K 型经济的讨论再次酝酿。这一称谓在 2020 年首次受到关注，当时是为了描述美国富人和穷人在经历大流行病复苏时的差异。现在，随着消费日益集中于工薪阶层的顶层，经济学家担心美国经济会陷入头重脚轻的不稳定状态。【原文：Talk of the K-shaped economy is brewing once again. The moniker first gained traction in 2020 to describe the divergence between how rich and poor Americans were experiencing the pandemic recovery. Now, with consumption increasingly concentrated in the top echelons of wage earners, economists are concerned that the US economy finds itself in a top-heavy, unstable state.】

item.title: 买家从基金中提取现金，美国杠杆贷款面临压力
item.description: 由于对高风险债务的需求减弱，迫使一些借款人取消交易，另一些借款人则提出更优惠的条件，美国杠杆贷款销售正面临压力。【原文：US leveraged loan sales are coming under pressure as demand for the risky debt wanes, forcing some borrowers to cancel deals and others to sweeten terms.】

item.title: 如果你已经二十多岁，拥有大学学位不再能帮助你更快找到工作
item.description: 克利夫兰联邦储备银行的最新研究显示，大学毕业生历来比只有高中学历的人更快找到工作，但这种优势正在成为过去。【原文：College graduates have historically found jobs more quickly than people with only a high school degree, but that advantage is becoming a thing of the past, according to new research from the Federal Reserve Bank of Cleveland.】

item.title: Anthropic 称其新型人工智能模型更擅长编码和办公室工作
item.description: Anthropic PBC 正在推出其最强大的人工智能模型的新版本，旨在更好地实现编码和办公任务的自动化，这也是该公司与 OpenAI 和 Alphabet 公司的谷歌（Google）针对企业客户展开竞争的努力的一部分。【原文：Anthropic PBC is rolling out a new version of its most powerful artificial intelligence model that is designed to be better at automating coding and office tasks, part of an effort to compete with OpenAI and Alphabet Inc.’s Google for business customers.】

item.title: 黑客攻击常春藤盟校 已面临政治压力
item.description: 最近几周，黑客袭击了美国的精英大学，从捐赠者那里窃取了敏感数据，并在一连串的数字劫案中盗取了学生的信息，这只会给已经饱受政治压力的学校增加压力。【原文：Hackers have struck elite US universities in recent weeks, pilfering sensitive data from donors and making off with students’ information in a string of digital heists that only add stress to schools already besieged with political pressure.】

item.title: 红杉支持的 Pennylane 公司希望以 43 亿美元的估值获得融资
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，法国一家销售会计软件的初创公司 Pennylane 正在洽谈一笔估值 42.5 亿美元的潜在投资，比七个月前的一轮投资估值高出近一倍。【原文：Pennylane, a French startup that sells accounting software, is in talks for a potential investment at a $4.25 billion valuation, nearly double what it was valued at in a round just seven months ago, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 巴西创纪录的税收收入未能缓解财政压力
item.description: 巴西政府正竭力支撑其预算前景并实现财政目标，尽管其税收收入达到了前所未有的水平。【原文：Brazil’s government is struggling to shore up its budget outlook and reach fiscal targets even as it hauls in unprecedented levels of tax revenue.】

item.title: 加拿大皇家银行否认 "男孩俱乐部 "文化和对女性有偏见的说法
item.description: 加拿大皇家银行（Royal Bank of Canada）否认在其美国资本市场业务中助长 "男孩俱乐部 "环境的说法，对该公司对女银行家实施性别歧视、为女性提供不平等薪酬和晋升机会的指控提出质疑。【原文：Royal Bank of Canada denies claims that it fostered a “boys’ club” environment at its US capital-markets business, disputing allegations that the firm engaged in sex-based discrimination against female bankers and offered unequal pay and promotions to women.】

item.title: OpenAI 在节日前推出 ChatGPT 购物研究工具
item.description: OpenAI 推出了一款由人工智能驱动的免费购物研究工具，称它可以在假日期间为 ChatGPT 用户生成个性化的买家指南。【原文：OpenAI unveiled a free artificial intelligence-powered shopping research tool that it says can generate a personalized buyer’s guide for ChatGPT users during the holiday season.】

item.title: 卡尼考虑下周出访华盛顿，美加贸易谈判陷入僵局
item.description: 熟悉内情的人士说，美国和加拿大之间的贸易谈判仍然停滞不前，两国政府都逐渐相信，关键问题将被纳入明年对北美贸易协定的更广泛审查之中。【原文：Trade talks between the US and Canada remain stalled, and there’s an emerging belief in both governments that key issues will be rolled into next year’s broader review of the North American trade accord, people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 巴西石油巨头巴西国家石油公司（Petrobras）将推迟主要油田的钻机交易，原因是全球石油供应过剩问题加剧
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，巴西国家石油公司可能会将其最大近海油田的多达四份钻探合同的授予时间至少推迟几个月。【原文：Brazil’s national oil company will likely delay awarding as many as four drilling contracts for its largest offshore field by at least a few months, according to people familiar with the matter — a move that comes as traders eye the country’s production closely amid an emerging global crude glut.】

item.title: 美国互联网巨头面临日益严重的长期风险
item.description: 大家好，欢迎收看《奇货可居》时事通讯，这里每天都有来自《奇货可居》的精彩内容。有时是我们乔-韦森塔尔（Joe Weisenthal）和特蕾西-阿洛维（Tracy Alloway）为您带来我们对市场、金融和经济最新发展的看法。有时是我们的专家嘉宾和消息来源网络提供的内容。不管是什么，我们保证永远有趣。【原文：Hello and welcome to the newsletter, a grab bag of daily content from the Odd Lots universe. Sometimes it's us, Joe Weisenthal and Tracy Alloway, bringing you our thoughts on the most recent developments in markets, finance and the economy. And sometimes it's contributions from our network of expert guests and sources. Whatever it is, we promise it will always be interesting.】

item.title: 规模人工智能公司在争夺美国英特尔公司的工作中败给了规模较小的初创公司
item.description: 一家人工智能初创公司击败了更大的竞争对手 Scale AI 公司，赢得了一份为期七年的合同，为美国国防部和情报界提供人工智能和机器学习的数据标签。【原文：An AI startup has won a seven-year contract to supply data labeling for artificial intelligence and machine learning for the US Department of Defense and intelligence community, beating out a larger rival, Scale AI Inc.】

item.title: 纳格尔称欧洲央行正在监控食品和服务业的高通胀率
item.description: 欧洲中央银行理事会成员约阿希姆-纳格尔（Joachim Nagel）表示，欧洲中央银行必须继续监控科维德事件后通胀飙升的后遗症，包括食品价格上涨和服务成本上升。【原文：The European Central Bank must continue to monitor after-effects of the post-Covid spike in inflation including higher food prices and sticky services costs, according to Governing Council member Joachim Nagel said.】

item.title: 亚马逊斥资 500 亿美元向美国机构拓展人工智能服务
item.description: 亚马逊公司（Amazon.com Inc. ）表示，它将斥资多达 500 亿美元，扩大向美国政府实体提供人工智能和高性能计算服务的能力。【原文：Amazon.com Inc. says it will spend as much as $50 billion expanding its capacity to provide artificial intelligence and high-performance computing services to US government entities.】

item.title: SAP 重组后员工对领导层的信任度下降
item.description: 欧洲最有价值的软件公司 SAP SE 的执行董事会在最近的裁员和组织结构调整后正面临着员工信任度下降的问题，这凸显了人们对其高层领导的日益担忧。【原文：The executive board of SAP SE, Europe’s most valuable software company, is facing declining employee trust following recent job cuts and organizational restructuring, underscoring growing concerns about its senior leadership.】

item.title: 加拿大企业在关税打击下仍获利丰厚
item.description: 加拿大企业继续扩大利润，即使经济面临关税损害。【原文：Canada’s corporations continue to expand their profits, even as the economy contends with tariff damage.】
